dcterms:creator: Emanuel Todorov
Tom Erez
Yuval Tassa
dcterms:description: The Reacher environment involves navigating a 2-DoF robot arm to reach a target, with actions constrained by a nonlinear convex constraint.
dcterms:title: Reacher Environment

dcterms:creator: Emanuel Todorov
Tom Erez
Yuval Tassa
dcterms:description: The Half Cheetah environment requires the agent to make a cheetah run forward by applying torque on its joints, with actions constrained by a specific torque limit.
dcterms:title: Half Cheetah Environment

dcterms:creator: Emanuel Todorov
Tom Erez
Yuval Tassa
dcterms:description: The Hopper environment involves controlling a robot to hop forward by applying torques to its hinges, with actions constrained by angular velocity limits.
dcterms:title: Hopper Environment

dcterms:creator: Emanuel Todorov
Tom Erez
Yuval Tassa
dcterms:description: The Walker2d environment requires controlling a robot to walk forward by applying torques to its joints, with actions constrained by angular velocity limits.
dcterms:title: Walker2d Environment

dcterms:creator: Abhinav Bhatia
Pradeep Varakantham
Akshat Kumar
dcterms:description: The Bike Sharing System (BSS) environment involves allocating bikes among stations based on previous allocation and demand while adhering to capacity constraints.
dcterms:title: Bike Sharing System (BSS)
